plot: John struggles to find a connection with people. His lack of human interaction leads to loneliness and isolation. These feelings of lonesomeness are erased by the simple gesture of a young girl and her father.
title: A Simple Gesture
plot_es: John struggles to find a connection with people. His lack of human interaction leads to loneliness and isolation. These feelings of lonesomeness are erased by the simple gesture of a young girl and her father.
plot_en: John struggles to find a connection with people. His lack of human interaction leads to loneliness and isolation. These feelings of lonesomeness are erased by the simple gesture of a young girl and her father.
